messages.text: Hi, I'm Ava Ramirez. My order 9K-221 shipped to 742 Harbor View Rd, Southport NC 28461 hasn't arrived.
Thanks Ava. I see carrier UPS marked a delay due to weather in Wilmington. I'll update you by 5 PM ET.
This is Malcolm Pierce. Please change my contact to +1-910-555-2299 and malcolm.pierce@example.com.
Confirmed, Malcolm. Phone and email updated.
